about_the_game:
Story

You play as "Randall" a guy who moves back home after quitting University. You are faced with the situation that Sue, your loving "landlady" wants to give herself breast implants. How will you cope with the beloved woman of your fantasies becoming a step closer to your perfect woman or shall we say SLUT? How will you handle the attention Sue will inevitably get from others? Maybe if she is prepared to get bigger tits, then maybe she would go even further into being your perfect woman?

As if that wasn’t enough to deal with, Lucia, Sue’s best friend, is interested in Sue’s transformation. Will she be a help or a hindrance in realising your fantasy? Either way, it will be fun finding out. Mix into this a little trouble with your ex and things are starting to get a lot to handle.



Progression

Throughout the game, you will witness, Sue, your landlady, as she gradually opts for an increasingly provocative attire while you encourage her to push her to her limits and to let go of the responsibilities of the past.

As you make your feelings known to her and her resistance falls away you will be able to persuade her to make more interesting and bigger modifications to her body and as her body changes so will her feelings about sex and about the young man living under her roof. Be careful though, you will face challenges and create enemies, and as Sue stands out more, more people will take notice of her. How you feel about that is up to you. Don't expect the creation and corruption of the perfect woman to be without its challenges.

Join Randall, Sue, Lucia and Scarlett on this story of changes, both physical and emotional. How will Sue come to see him as a real man? A man who can support her in her discovery and transformation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is designed exclusively for adult audiences and contains explicit sexual content that may be offensive to some viewers. 

The characters, storyline, and events portrayed are fictional, and all characters are depicted as being 21 years of age or older. 

The content includes nudity, depictions of alternative lifestyles, implied alcohol and drug use, graphic representations of various sexual acts including oral, vaginal, anal, and non-penetrative acts, as well as references to bodily fluids, rape, and blackmail.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 Super
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9.5
  • Processor: 64 bit Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura 13.5
  • Processor: 64 bit Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 Super
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a lustful journey in this adult visual novel. Guide a Uni dropout as he chases his desire, only to find his dream woman transforming into his ultimate fantasy. Make choices involving lots of sex and naughty situations to make his bimbo dreams come true.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, German, Norwegian, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
